name: Zealot
description: Barbarians whose rage is infused with divine power, driving them to fight beyond death.

3.name: Divine Fury
3.description: While raging, the first creature you hit on each of your turns takes extra necrotic or radiant damage equal to 1d6 + half your barbarian level.

3.name: Warrior of the Gods
3.description: Spells that restore you to life don't require material components.

6.name: Fanatical Focus
6.description: If you fail a saving throw while raging, you can reroll it, using the new result. Once per rage.

10.name: Zealous Presence
10.description: As a bonus action, give up to ten creatures within 60 feet advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of your next turn. Once per long rest.

14.name: Rage beyond Death
14.description: While raging, having 0 hit points doesn't knock you unconscious. You still make death saves and only die after your rage ends if you still have 0 hit points.

choices.name: Zealot Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Zealot subclass
